price: (119) And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
